data.name: Ever Seen a Cat? 2 - Paper Edition + Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
Includes:




  • PDF paper edition of Ever Seen a Cat? 2 Including in-color, and black and white versions. Both versions have A4 and US-letter sizes. Print them out and play offline!



    • Separate pages as they appear in the game. High resolution, and uncropped!



    • Separate black and white pages. Coloring these detailed pages will surely be relaxing and fun!



    • Wallpapers. These are the colored pages, with the cats shown! They double as a guide for cat locations too. Also includes the menu and cover art.

    Where to find the files?




    Right click on the game in your library list.
    Click "properties..."


    Navigate to local files tab.
    Click "Browse..." button.


    In your Ever Seen a Cat? 2 folder will be a folder called DLC.
    Within you'll find all PDFs and images.

data.short_description: The nine pages of the game for print, as coloring pages, and wallpapers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
